casebody.data:
Shawn ROBINSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 18, 2017

James E. Mortimer, in support of the petition.

Robert J. Scheinblum, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Shawn Robinson's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 907, 155 A.3d 329 (2016), is denied.
